sentence.Network_en: The play deals wittily and intelligently with the pain of betrayal.
sentence.Network_cn: 该剧讲的是遭到背叛的痛苦，语言诙谐，充满智慧。

sentence.Network_en: "Count Dracula, I presume," I said wittily.
sentence.Network_cn: “我想是德拉库拉伯爵吧。”我打趣地说。

sentence.Network_en: They have just been pulling our legs very wittily.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不过是跟我们开个非常诙谐的玩笑罢了.

list.abs: 笑涡 English, 翻译, 例句, 字典... ... 谈笑风生 to talk cheerfully and wittily;to joke together 涡核 eye of a vortex.
The tale wittily explores the interaction and tension between reality and imagination ., 这篇故事机智地探讨了现实和想象之间的联系和对立.

entry.tran: 机智幽默的;妙趣横生的;诙谐的
entry.def: Someone or something that is witty is amusing in a clever way.

example.ex: His plays were very good, very witty...
example.tran: 他的剧作非常精彩，妙趣横生。

example.ex: He is a very witty speaker.

sentences.sentence: "he would wittily chime into our conversation"

auth_sentence.content: Great Expectations...was a concept restaurant, themed wittily around the works of Dickens.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Great Expectations...was a concept restaurant, themed wittily around the works of Dickens.

auth_sentence.content: I said, wittily, I thought, that there was no shadow, because the cathedral was to the north of our house.
